Title: High School Poppycock
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Chris Rafferty, Jennifer Graham Imada, Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Mike Costa (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: Lucifer fights a mental block, Chloe has silly fun while solving a murder, and Maze helps her friends get some resolve.
